# Interface TTSNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface

Represents the properties for the TTS node execution config.

interface TTSNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface {  
reportToClient?: boolean;  
speakerId: string;  
synthesisConfig: [SpeechSynthesisConfigInterface](./primitives_tts_config.SpeechSynthesisConfigInterface);  
tts_component_id: string;  
}

#### Hierarchy ([View Summary](/hierarchy#graph/nodes/NodeExecutionConfig.TTSNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface))

  * [NodeExecutionConfig](/classes/graph_nodes_NodeExecutionConfig.NodeExecutionConfig)
    * TTSNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface



##### Index

### Properties

reportToClient? speakerId synthesisConfig tts_component_id

## Properties

### `Optional`reportToClient

reportToClient?: boolean

Whether to report to the client.

Inherited from [NodeExecutionConfig](/classes/graph_nodes_NodeExecutionConfig.NodeExecutionConfig).[reportToClient](/classes/graph_nodes_NodeExecutionConfig.NodeExecutionConfig#reporttoclient)

### speakerId

speakerId: string

The speaker ID.

### synthesisConfig

synthesisConfig: [SpeechSynthesisConfigInterface](./primitives_tts_config.SpeechSynthesisConfigInterface)

The speech synthesis config.

### tts_component_id

tts_component_id: string

TTS component ID that was registered in the component registry
